title: Can I replace in-game voince by Japanese in OCE server?
body:
I'm really Interested in Japanese voice.
I'd like to know whether there is any way to change game voice into another language?
Can I replace files with Japanese server's files?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently possible using [LVOC (League VO Changer)](http://lexwah.com/lvoc/) however this tool is considered "use at your own risk", meaning that while Riot is not currently imposing bans for things such as this. It is possible that this could change at any time, therefore if you were to be banned at some point in the future as a result of this tool Riot is under no obligation to help you out.
